where.label: WR9

where.expression: NOT(SIZEOF(passage_component) >= 1) OR (SIZEOF(QUERY(pc <* passage_component | NOT (SIZEOF(tiebar_resident_stratum * passage_resident_stratum) = SIZEOF(tiebar_resident_stratum)) )) = 0)
where.label: WR10

subtype.constraint.name: limwpcd_structured_layout_component_subtypes
subtype.constraint.super.expression: ONEOF (Footprint_occurrence, Material_removal_structured_component, Multi_stratum_printed_component, Multi_stratum_special_symbol_component, Padstack_occurrence, Single_stratum_printed_component, Single_stratum_special_symbol_component)
